message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, considering its true value is worth much more to you.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm still looking to get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10500. This is a compromise that I think you'll find reasonable, considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product.
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I'll meet you at $10000, which is the minimum I'm willing to accept. This is the best deal I can offer, considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. I'm willing to pay $9800 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $9900, but that's as low as I can go. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $9900, Alice, but I'm still trying to squeeze out a bit more savings. I'm willing to pay $9600 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already compromised significantly, and I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $9700, but that's as low as I can go. This is my final offer.
This is my final offer, Alice. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product.
